nodes.text: Erik Orentiis was a male Human living in New Adasta on Ziost with his relative Rhea Orentiis during the Galactic War. In 3636 BBY the former Sith Emperor Vitiate came to the world and possessed many of the Imperials on the planet, turning them into his puppets to murder civilians. After the Galactic Republic began landing on Ziost, Rhea noticed how the soldiers were not acting like during a typical invasion.
Erik Orentiis was added to Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan in game update 3.2.
